Model.name: CorrosionCase
Model.Description: This is the full list of general input parameters.

Parameter.name: Temperature
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk system temperature

Parameter.name: Total Pressure
Parameter.toolTips: Total pressure of the system.\n If the exact pressure is unknown, a suggested pressure is 10% greater than the sum of the known partial pressures.

Parameter.name: Corrosion Type
Parameter.toolTips: Select:\n BLC - bottom of line corrosion\n TLC - top of the line corrosion (Company must be a sponsor of TLC research to use TLC option.)

Parameter.name: Flow Type
Parameter.toolTips:
Select flow type:
 Single phase: water flow
 Two phase: oil/water flow or gas/water flow
 Three phase: gas/oil/water flow

Parameter.name: Simulation Engine
Parameter.toolTips: Select simulation engine:\n Multicorp: point model/parametric run/ line run\n Freecorp: transient simulation/ steady state simulation

Parameter.name: Simulation Type
Language
Parameter.toolTips: Language for which format will be used to store model in input file.\n Currently stores only numbers in selected format.\n Parameter names are still in english.

Parameter.name: H2S Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of hydrogen sulfide. Recommended limits: pH2S greater than 0.0001 bar, but less than 1 bar.

Parameter.name: CO2 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of carbon dioxide.

Parameter.name: N2 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of nitrogen.\n Used to balance total pressure as it has no effect on corrosion rate.

Parameter.name: HAc Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of acetic acid.

Parameter.name: H2O Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: The partial pressure of water vapor is directly related to the temperature and cannot be adjusted by the user.\n pH2O(bar)=EXP(73.649 - 7258.2/Tk - 7.3037*LN(Tk) + 0.0000041653*(Tk)^2)/100000\n Perry's 7th Ed., p2-54, Table 2-6

Parameter.name: CH4 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of methane.

Parameter.name: C2H6 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of ethane.

Parameter.name: C3H8 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of propane.

Parameter.name: C4H10 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of butane.

Parameter.name: C5H12 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of pentane.

Parameter.name: C6H14 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of hexane.

Parameter.name: C7H16 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of heptane.

Parameter.name: C8H18 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure of octane.

Parameter.name: pH
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk pH value after saturation of soluble gases into water composition.

Parameter.name: CO2
Parameter.toolTips: Aqueous concentration of carbon dioxide.

Parameter.name: H2CO3
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of carbonic acid in solution.

Parameter.name: HCO3-
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of bicarbonate in solution.

Parameter.name: CO32-
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of carbonate ion in solution.

Parameter.name: HAc
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of free acetic acid in solution.

Parameter.name: Ac-
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of acetate in solution.

Parameter.name: Total HAc+Ac
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of total acetic acid in solution (HAc + Ac-).

Parameter.name: H2S
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of aqueous hydrogen sulfide [H2S(aq)].

Parameter.name: HS-
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of bisulfide.

Parameter.name: S2-
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of sulfide ion.

Parameter.name: H2S+HS+S
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of total sulfides in solution [H2S(aq) + HS + S2-].

Parameter.name: H+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of hydrogen ions.

Parameter.name: Fe2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of ferrous ions.

Parameter.name: Na+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of sodium ions.

Parameter.name: Ca2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of calcium ions.

Parameter.name: Ba2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of barium ions.

Parameter.name: K+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of potassium ions.

Parameter.name: Mg2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of magnesium ions.

Parameter.name: Sr2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of strontium ions.

Parameter.name: Cl-
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of chloride ions.

Parameter.name: SO42-
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of sulfate ions.

Parameter.name: OH-
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of hydroxide ions.

Parameter.name: NaCl
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of NaCl.

Parameter.name: O2
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of Oxygen.

Parameter.name: Ionic Strength
Parameter.toolTips: Ionic strength of the bulk solution

Parameter.name: Alkalinity
Parameter.toolTips: Equivalent bicarbonate balance

Parameter.name: FeCO3 Saturation Level
Parameter.toolTips: Saturation level of iron carbonate: S(FeCO3)=[Fe2+][CO32-]/Ksp(FeCO3)

Parameter.name: CaCO3 Saturation Level
Parameter.toolTips: Saturation level of calcium carbonate: S(CaCO3)=[Ca2+][CO32-]/Ksp(CaCO3)

Parameter.name: CaSO4 Saturation Level
Parameter.toolTips: Saturation level of calcium sulfate: S(CaSO4)=[Ca2+][SO42-]/Ksp(CaSO4)

Parameter.name: FeS Saturation Level
Parameter.toolTips: Saturation level of iron sulfide: S(FeS)=[Fe2+][S2-]/Ksp(FeS)mackinawite

Parameter.name: Superficial Water Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Vsl - the hypothetical fluid velocity calculated as if water was the only phase filling the cross sectional area.

Parameter.name: Superficial Gas Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Vsg - a hypothetical gas velocity calculated as if gas was the only phase filling the cross sectional area.

Parameter.name: Superficial Oil Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Vso - a hypothetical fluid velocity calculated as if oil was the only phase filling the cross sectional area.

Parameter.name: Input Type
Parameter.toolTips: Choose the preferred input:\n - flow velocity or\n - volumetric flow rate.

Parameter.name: Velocity Input Type
Parameter.toolTips: Choose the preferred input:\n - oil-water input (input velocity or flow for oil and water)\n - mixture input (input velocity or flow of the mixture and water cut)

Parameter.name: Water Flow Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Volumetric flow rate of water.

Parameter.name: Gas Flow Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Volumetric flow rate of gas.

Parameter.name: Oil Flow Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Volumetric flow rate of oil.

Parameter.name: Mixture Flow Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Total volumetric liquid flow rate=water flow rate + oil flow rate.

Parameter.name: Mixture Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Vsm - hypothetical fluid velocity calculated as if oil/water mix was the only phase filling the cross sectional area.

Parameter.name: Water Cut
Parameter.toolTips: Amount of water in total liquid volume.

Parameter.name: Water Density
Parameter.toolTips: Density of Water phase.

Parameter.name: Water Viscosity
Parameter.toolTips: Dynamic viscosity of water phase.

Parameter.name: Oil Density
Parameter.toolTips: Density of Oil phase.

Parameter.name: Oil Viscosity
Parameter.toolTips: Dynamic viscosity of oil.

Parameter.name: Wetting Factor
Parameter.toolTips: Relationship of the wettability of a solid surface to the specified liquid.

Parameter.name: Oil Heat Capacity
Parameter.toolTips: Heat capacity input value for oil.

Parameter.name: Interfacial Tension
Parameter.toolTips: Adhesive forces (tension) between the liquid phase of one substance and either a solid, liquid or gas phase of another substance.

Parameter.name: Contact Angle
Parameter.toolTips: The angle formed at the liquid/solid boundary when a liquid is in contract with a solid surface.

Parameter.name: Gas Properties Input
Parameter.toolTips: Choose gas properties to be calculated by:\n - Peng-Robinson equation (default) or\n - input values defined by user.

Parameter.name: Gas Density
Parameter.toolTips: Density of the gas phase.

Parameter.name: Gas Viscosity
Parameter.toolTips: Dynamic viscosity of gas phase.

Parameter.name: Gas Liquid Surface Tension
Parameter.toolTips: The interfacial tension at the gas and liquid interface.

Parameter.name: Flow Pattern
Parameter.toolTips: Flow regime determined from input values.

Parameter.name: Wetting Phase
Parameter.toolTips: The phase that will wet the surface of the internal pipe wall.

Parameter.name: Critical Mixture Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The critical liquid velocity above which one of the phases is dispersed in another phase.

Parameter.name: Critical Mixture Flow Rate
Parameter.toolTips: The flow rate under critical mixture velocity.

Parameter.name: Water Layer Thickness
Parameter.toolTips: The depth of the water layer on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: Mixture Layer Thickness
Parameter.toolTips: The depth of the oil/water mixture on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: In-Situ Water Layer Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The velocity of the water layer on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: In-Situ Oil Layer Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The velocity of the oil layer on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: In-Situ Gas Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The velocity of the gas phase through the pipe.

Parameter.name: In-Situ Mixture Layer Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The velocity of the oil/water mixture on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: Liquid Holdup
Parameter.toolTips: The in-situ area fraction of the liquid phase over the pipe cross section.

Parameter.name: Wall-shear Stress in Water layer
Parameter.toolTips: The shear stress from the flow of water on the internal wall of the pipeline.

Parameter.name: Slug Frequency
Parameter.toolTips: The occurring frequency of the slug phenomenon in a slug flow.

Parameter.name: Pressure Drop
Parameter.toolTips: Pressure drop of the pipe flow

Parameter.name: Entrainment Fraction
Parameter.toolTips: The ratio of the entrained liquid droplet mass flow rate to the entire liquid mass flow rate.

Parameter.name: Mixture Density
Parameter.toolTips: Density of the water/hydrocarbon mixture.

Parameter.name: In-Situ Liquid Layer Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: The velocity of the water/hydrocarbon mixture on the bottom of the pipe.

Parameter.name: Wall Shear Stress in Liquid Layer
Parameter.toolTips: The shear stress from the liquid flow on the internal wall of the pipe.

Parameter.name: Rate of Droplet Deposition
Parameter.toolTips: The mass rate of deposition of liquid droplet entrained in the gas phase per unit area.

Parameter.name: Wall Shear Stress
Parameter.toolTips: The shear stress resulting from flow on the internal wall of the pipe.

Parameter.name: Hydraulic Liquid Diameter
Parameter.toolTips: Hydraulic Diameter for liqud phase

Parameter.name: Temperature
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk system temperature

Parameter.name: Total Pressure
Parameter.toolTips: Total pressure of the system.\n If the exact pressure is unknown, a suggested pressure is 10% greater than the sum of the known partial pressures.

Parameter.name: H2S Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of hydrogen sulfide. Recommended limits: pH2S greater than 0.0001 bar, but less than 1 bar.

Parameter.name: CO2 Gas Content
Parameter.toolTips: Partial pressure or mol percent of carbon dioxide.

Parameter.name: pH
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk pH value after saturation of soluble gases into water composition.

Parameter.name: HAc
Parameter.toolTips: Concentration of free acetic acid in solution.

Parameter.name: Fe2+
Parameter.toolTips: Bulk concentration of ferrous ions.

Parameter.name: Section Diameter
Parameter.toolTips: Internal diameter of pipe section.
Parameter.softLimitCheckParams: Water Flow Rate, Oil Flow Rate, Gas Flow Rate, Mixture Flow Rate

Parameter.name: Superficial Water Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Vsl - the hypothetical fluid velocity calculated as if water was the only phase filling the cross sectional area.

Parameter.name: Simulation Duration
Parameter.toolTips: Total simulation time.

Parameter.name: Current Simulation Time
Parameter.toolTips: Current value for time during simulation.

Parameter.name: Corrosion Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Current value for corrosion rate during simulation.

Parameter.name: Simulation Duration
Parameter.toolTips: Total simulation time.

Parameter.name: Current Simulation Time
Parameter.toolTips: Current value for time during simulation.

Parameter.name: Corrosion Rate
Parameter.toolTips: Current value for corrosion rate during simulation.

Parameter.name: Section Input Type
Parameter.toolTips: Select input type:\n Length and inclination of section\n Coordinates of starting and ending points of section

Parameter.name: Section Length
Parameter.toolTips: Length parameter for pipe section.

Parameter.name: Number of steps
Parameter.toolTips: The number of equally spaced locations along the pipe section for point model calculation.

Parameter.name: Step Length
Parameter.toolTips: Length of each step

Parameter.name: Start X
Parameter.toolTips: Horizontal parameter for beginning of pipe section.

Parameter.name: Start Y
Parameter.toolTips: Vertical parameter for beginning of pipe section.

Parameter.name: End X
Parameter.toolTips: Horizontal parameter for end of pipe section.

Parameter.name: End Y
Parameter.toolTips: Vertical parameter for end of pipe section.

Parameter.name: Section Diameter
Parameter.toolTips: Internal diameter of pipe section.
Parameter.softLimitCheckParams: Water Flow Rate, Oil Flow Rate, Gas Flow Rate, Mixture Flow Rate

Parameter.name: Section Inclination
Parameter.toolTips: Inclination parameter for pipe section.

Parameter.name: Pipe Roughness
Parameter.toolTips: A measure of the surface texture of the internal surface of pipe section.

Parameter.name: Pipe Thickness
Parameter.toolTips: Pipe wall thickness from interal radius to external radius.

Parameter.name: Pipe Conductivity
Parameter.toolTips: Pipeline material thermal conductivity.

Parameter.name: Environment Type
Parameter.toolTips: Choose external environment of pipe location: Sea, River, or Air.

Parameter.name: Outside Temperature
Parameter.toolTips: Environmental temperature on the external pipe wall.

Parameter.name: Current/Wind Velocity
Parameter.toolTips: Velocity of current or wind on external pipe wall.

Parameter.name: Burial ratio
Parameter.toolTips: The percentage of the outer pipe diameter covered by soil.

Parameter.name: Soil Thickness
Parameter.toolTips: The thickness of the soil ABOVE the top of the pipeline.\nOnly used if Burial Ratio is equal to 100%.

Parameter.name: Soil Conductivity
Parameter.toolTips: Soil thermal conductivity.

Parameter.name: Insulation Type
Parameter.toolTips: Type of insulation on external pipe wall.

Parameter.name: Insulation Thickness
Parameter.toolTips: Thickness of insulation on external pipe wall.

Parameter.name: Insulation Conductivity
Parameter.toolTips: Thermal conductivity of insulation on external pipe wall.
